title: Delightful gem hidden away in the centre of classical Rome
text: I stayed at the Inn for three nights with my 10 year old son and elderly parents. We were looked after magnificently, and I can't praise the staff highly enough. They coped admirably with the needs of each of the group. Particular high points were the evening dinner reservations - each restaurant recommended was excellent, close enough to walk to and expecting us. Also the guide they found for us for a tour of the Colosseum and Forum - highly recommended. Very good breakfasts on the top floor, with the option of eating on the terrace (weather permitting). The location is very central, but hidden away in a back street. Good views of the Capitoline Hill if you go right to the top of the terrace.
